paper_abstract: Let be a finite field of order , a prime, and an extension field of with degree . First, the structure and a canonical form decomposition of any -constacyclic -linear code over are presented. By use of this decomposition, enumeration, construction, encoder and dual codes of these codes are investigated. Then self-orthogonal and self-dual negacyclic -linear codes over are studied, and a precisely expression for self-dual negacyclic -linear codes over is obtained.
